con:assertion.name: Smart Assertion - Valid HTTP Status code

con:config.script:
import static com.jayway.jsonpath.JsonPath.parse
def eventAttributeId = context.expand( '${GetEventAttributeByEventName#Response#$[?(@.AttributeName==\'TransactionEligible\')].EventAttributeId[0]}')

import static com.jayway.jsonpath.JsonPath.parse
def EventAttriForVisits = context.expand( '${GetEventAttributeByEventName#Response#$[?(@.AttributeName==\'Visits\')].EventAttributeId[0]}')

con:restRequest.name: UpdateEventAttributeByEventName
con:restRequest.con:request: { "EventAttributeId": "${eventAttributeId#result}", "AttributeName": "TransactionEligible", "CyclicIndicator": true, "CapIndicator": false, "CyclicMapField": "EligibleRevenue", "IsLineItem": false, "CollectionIndicator": false, "DataTypeDrl": "Double", "DataTypeUi": "Number", "EventType": "PurchaseTxn", "AttributeFqn": "PurchaseTxn.TransactionEligible", "DroolsVariableName": "$PurchaseTxn", "CollectionAttribute": false, "UsedAsCyclic": false, "ReturnAttribute": false, "IsValueGroupHierarchy": false, "IsEnrichmentLinkedAttribute": false, "IsEnrichmentAttribute": false, "Status": "A" }

con:assertion.name: Smart Assertion - Valid HTTP status code

con:restRequest.name: UpdateEventAttributeForVisits
con:restRequest.con:request:
{ "EventAttributeId": "${EventAttriForVisits#result}", "AttributeName": "Visits", "CyclicIndicator": true, "CapIndicator": false, "CyclicMapField": "Visits", "IsLineItem": false, "CollectionIndicator": false, "DataTypeDrl": "Double", "DataTypeUi": "Number", "EventType": "PurchaseTxn", "AttributeFqn": "PurchaseTxn.Visits", "DroolsVariableName": "$PurchaseTxn", "CollectionAttribute": false, "UsedAsCyclic": false, "ReturnAttribute": false, "IsValueGroupHierarchy": false, "IsEnrichmentLinkedAttribute": false, "IsEnrichmentAttribute": false, "Status": "A"
}

con:property.con:name: CreateBody
UpdateBody

con:restRequest.name: AddProfileRGR
con:restRequest.con:request:
{ "Prefix":"Mr.", "FirstName":"Rick", "MiddleInit":"", "LastName":"Lega", "CardNumber":"${=java.util.UUID.randomUUID()}", "Suffix": "", "GlobalOptOut": "FALSE", "GlobalOptDate": "6/26/2017 12:00:00 AM", "GlobalOptSource": "", "LanguageCode": "EN_US", "MaritalStatus": "S", "Gender": "M", "BirthDate": "3/22/1982 12:00:00 AM", "CompanyName": "Epsilon", "Addresses": [ { "AddressLine1":"123 THE RD", "AddressLine2": "#3333", "AddressLine3": "", "City": "IRVING", "StateCode": "TX", "CountryCode": "USA", "PostalCode": "75080", "ChannelCode": "DM", "LocationCode": "H", "IsPreferred": "TRUE", "DeliveryStatus": "G", "DoNotStandardize": "FALSE" } ], "Emails": [ { "EmailAddress": "Test@dx2mail.co", "ChannelCode": "EM", "LocationCode": "B", "IsPreferred": "TRUE", "DeliveryStatus": "G" } ], "Phones": [ { "PhoneNumber": "5025101947", "PhoneCountryCode": "USA", "AcceptsText":"TRUE", "Frequency": "7", "ChannelCode":"SM", "LocationCode":"H", "IsPreferred": "TRUE", "DeliveryStatus":"G" } ], "SourceCode": "PP_WEB", "JoinDate":"${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd").format(new Date()+5)}", "EnrollChannelCode": "WEB", "TierCode":"COOP", "TermsConditionsAcceptedInd": "FALSE", "ActivityDate": "6/26/2017 12:00:00 AM", "CreateFileId": "4546546", "CreateRecordNumber": "987654325", "UpdateFileId": 987654323, "UpdateRecordNumber": 987654324, "AutoRewardOptInInd": "TRUE",
}

con:assertion.name: Smart Assertion for HTTP Status Code

con:property.con:name: Body
con:property.con:value: { "ProfileId": "${AddProfileRGR#Response#$['ProfileId']}", "TransactionTypeCode": "PR", "TransactionNetTotal": "100", "ShippingAndHandling": "0", "TransactionTotalTax": "10", "TransactionNumber": "Tran_${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMddHHmmss").format(new Date())}", "CurrencyCode": "USD", "PostingDateTime": "3/30/2017 12:00:00 AM", "TransactionDateTime": "3/2/2018 12:00:00 AM", "TransactionEndDateTime": "3/2/2018 12:00:00 AM", "OnlyAddTransData": "FALSE", "SuspendTransaction": "FALSE", "TransactionDescription": "Test Transaction 1 for PP", "StoreCode": "PP1501", "ProgramCode":"PP", "GrossAmount": "110", "Tenders": [ { "TenderCode": "CASH", "TenderAmount": "50" } ] }

con:property.con:name: Body
con:property.con:value: { "ProfileId": "${#[Profile#AddVictimProfileRGR#AddProfileRGR]#Response#$['ProfileId']}", "TransactionTypeCode": "PR", "TransactionNetTotal": "90", "ShippingAndHandling": "0", "TransactionTotalTax": "10", "TransactionNumber": "Tranv_${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMddHHmmss").format(new Date())}", "CurrencyCode": "USD", "PostingDateTime": "3/30/2017 12:00:00 AM", "TransactionDateTime": "3/2/2018 12:00:00 AM", "TransactionEndDateTime": "3/2/2018 12:00:00 AM", "OnlyAddTransData": "FALSE", "SuspendTransaction": "FALSE", "TransactionDescription": "Test Transaction 1 for PP", "StoreCode": "PP1501", "ProgramCode": "PP", "GrossAmount": "100", "TransactionDetails": [ { "TaxAmount": "5", "DollarValueGross": "50", "DollarValueNet": "45", "ItemNumber": "SKU-00069", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "S", "Quantity": "1", "LineNumber": 1, "ItemTransactionTypeCode": "PR", } ], "Tenders": [ { "TenderCode": "CASH", "TenderAmount": "50" } ] }

con:property.con:name: Body
con:property.con:value: { "ProfileId": "${AddProfileRGR#Response#$['ProfileId']}", "TransactionTypeCode": "PR", "TransactionNetTotal": "100", "ShippingAndHandling": "0", "TransactionTotalTax": "10", "TransactionNumber": "Trans_${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMddHHmmss").format(new Date())}", "CurrencyCode": "USD", "PostingDateTime": "3/30/2017 12:00:00 AM", "TransactionDateTime": "3/2/2018 12:00:00 AM", "TransactionEndDateTime": "3/2/2018 12:00:00 AM", "OnlyAddTransData": "FALSE", "SuspendTransaction": "FALSE", "TransactionDescription": "Test Transaction 1 for PP", "StoreCode": "PP1501", "ProgramCode": "PP", "GrossAmount": "110", "Tenders": [ { "TenderCode": "CASH", "TenderAmount": "50" } ] }
